txt.en: 'That's the Three-Farthing Stone. It marks the boundary where three of the Four Farthings meet. '
'If you stand on a bench and squint, you can almost see the Northfarthing from here, too!'
'Yes, sir, this rock's been here since I was a boy, and it'll be here when we're all gone.'
'You young folk ought to have more respect for historical places like the Three-Farthing Stone.'
